verses.verse: Therefore <WG1352> leaving <WG863> the principles of <WG746> the teaching <WG3056> of Christ <WG5547>, let us go on <WG5342> unto <WG1909> perfection <WG5047>; not <WG3361> laying <WG2598> again <WG3825> the foundation <WG2310> of repentance <WG3341> from <WG575> dead <WG3498> works <WG2041>, and <WG2532> of faith <WG4102> toward <WG1909> God <WG2316>,

Of the teaching <WG1322> of baptisms <WG909>, and <WG5037> of laying on <WG1936> of hands <WG5495>, and <WG5037> of resurrection <WG386> of the dead <WG3498>, and <WG2532> of <WG2917> eternal <WG166> judgment <WG2917>.
And <WG2532> this <WG5124> will we do <WG4160>, if <WG1437> God <WG2316> permit <WG2010>.

For <WG1063> it is impossible <WG102> for those who were <WG5461> once <WG530> enlightened <WG5461>, and <WG5037> have tasted <WG1089> of the <WG1431> heavenly <WG2032> gift <WG1431>, and <WG2532> were made <WG1096> partakers <WG3353> of the <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151>,
And <WG2532> have tasted <WG1089> the <WG4487> good <WG2570> word <WG4487> of God <WG2316>, and <WG5037> the powers <WG1411> of the world <WG165> to come <WG3195>,

If <WG2532> they shall fall away <WG3895>, to renew them <WG340> again <WG3825> unto <WG1519> repentance <WG3341>; seeing they crucify <WG388> to themselves <WG1438> the Son <WG5207> of God <WG2316> again <WG388>, and <WG2532> put him to an open shame <WG3856>.

For <WG1063> the earth <WG1093> which <WG3588> drinks in <WG4095> the rain <WG5205> that comes <WG2064> often <WG4178> upon <WG1909> it <WG846>, and <WG2532> brings forth <WG5088> herbs <WG1008> suitable <WG2111> for them <WG1565> <WG99999> by <WG1223> whom <WG3739> it is tilled <WG1090>, receives <WG3335> blessing <WG2129> from <WG575> God <WG2316>:

But <WG1161> if it bears <WG1627> thorns <WG173> and <WG2532> briars <WG5146> it is rejected <WG96>, and <WG2532> is close to <WG1451> being cursed <WG2671>; whose <WG3739> end <WG5056> is to <WG1519> be burned <WG2740>.

But <WG1161>, beloved <WG27>, we are persuaded <WG3982> better things <WG2909> of <WG4012> you <WG5216>, and <WG2532> things that accompany <WG2192> salvation <WG1487>, though <WG2532> we <WG2980> thus <WG3779> speak <WG2980>.

For <WG1063> God <WG2316> is not <WG3756> unrighteous <WG94> to forget <WG1950> your <WG5216> work <WG2041> and <WG2532> labor <WG2873> of love <WG26>, which <WG3739> you have shown <WG1731> toward <WG1519> his <WG846> name <WG3686>, in that you have ministered to <WG1247> the saints <WG40>, and <WG2532> do minister <WG1247>.

And <WG1161> we desire that <WG1937> every one <WG1538> of you <WG5216> do show <WG1731> the <WG4710> same <WG846> diligence <WG4710> to <WG4314> the full assurance <WG4136> of hope <WG1680> unto <WG891> the end <WG5056>:

That <WG2443> you are <WG1096> not <WG3361> slothful <WG3576>, but <WG1161> followers <WG3402> of them who <WG2816> through <WG1223> faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> patience <WG3115> inherit <WG2816> the promises <WG1860>.

For <WG1063> when <WG1861> God <WG2316> promised <WG1861> Abraham <WG11>, because <WG1893> he could <WG2192> swear <WG3660> by <WG2596> no <WG3762> greater <WG3173>, he swore <WG3660> by <WG2596> himself <WG1438>,
Saying <WG2229>, Surely <WG3375> blessing <WG2127> I will bless <WG2127> you <WG4571>, and <WG2532> multiplying <WG4129> I will multiply <WG4129> you <WG4571>.
And <WG2532> so <WG3779>, after he had patiently endured <WG3114>, he obtained <WG2013> the promise <WG1860>.

For <WG1063> men <WG444> truly <WG3303> swear <WG3660> by <WG2596> something greater <WG3187>: and <WG2532> an oath <WG3727> for <WG1519> confirmation <WG951> is to them <WG846> an end <WG4009> of all <WG3956> strife <WG485>.

In <WG1722> this <WG3739> God <WG2316>, willing <WG1014> more abundantly <WG4054> to show <WG1925> to the heirs <WG2818> of promise <WG1860> the immutability <WG276> of <WG1012> his <WG846> counsel <WG1012>, confirmed <WG3315> it by an oath <WG3727>:

That <WG2443> by <WG1223> two <WG1417> immutable <WG276> things <WG4229>, in <WG1722> which <WG3739> it was impossible <WG102> for God <WG2316> to lie <WG5574>, we might have <WG2192> a <WG3874> strong <WG2478> consolation <WG3874>, who have fled for refuge <WG2703> to lay hold <WG2902> upon the hope <WG1680> set before us <WG4295>:

Which <WG3739> we have <WG2192> as <WG5613> an anchor <WG45> of the soul <WG5590>, both <WG5037> sure <WG804> and <WG2532> steadfast <WG949>, and <WG2532> entering <WG1525> into <WG1519> that which is inside <WG2082> the veil <WG2665>;

Where <WG3699> the forerunner <WG4274> has <WG1525> for <WG5228> us <WG2257> entered <WG1525>, even Jesus <WG2424>, made <WG1096> a high priest <WG749> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> after <WG2596> the order <WG5010> of Melchizedek <WG3198>.
